roleset.name: indiscriminate, sluttish
roleset.note: PROMISCUOUS-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from promiscuous.01-j)

role.descr: domain in which arg0 is indiscriminate

example.name: Arg0 only
example.text: One of the most common misperceptions is that the Mosuo are very promiscuous , changing partners all the time .

example.name: All args, sexual
example.text: First was a girl that-1 he was promiscuous with *T*-1 right before we started dating.

example.name: All args, non-sexual
example.text: He was promiscuous with his apologies.
